string-array.item: Beware of Pride because you will be returning to the earth and your body will be eaten up by the worms.

Islam was not a torch, as has been claimed, but an extinguisher. Conceived in a barbarous brain for the use of a barbarous people, it was - and it remains - incapable of adapting itself to civilization. Wherever it has dominated, it has broken the impulse towards progress and checked the evolution of society.
The Koran calls for belief and consequent obedience. It is, surely, calculated to inspire fear, indeed abject terror, rather than love.
O you who believe! Fasting is prescribed to you as it was prescribed to those before you. so that you may learn self restraint.
Be kind to one another, and know that Allah will be kinder.
Knowledge is not what is memorised, Knowledge is what benefits.
Allah did not say that the road would be easy, rather he said that he would be with those who are patient.
Part time Muslims can’t defeat full time shaitan.
Erase the past with repentance and build the future with sincerity and good deeds.
Don’t allow your trials to tear you down and make you bitter. With patience and faith, you’re supposed to pull through and be a better person.
INDEED, ALLAH IS WITH THOSE WHO ARE PATIENT.
Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
The hearts pray for what they desire, but Allah responds with what is better for them.
You may be facing trials, depression, doubts, worries and fears; but know that He will take care of everything if you only turn to Him.
